CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 在任何时候；任何时候；曾经；永远；一直；无休止地；从来；总是；始终；究竟；到底（用在where、who、how和why等词后加强疑问句语气）；非常；很；确实；的确（用于强调ever后面的内容）

word_group.brief_definition: 此后一直, 自…以来直至现在
以往；以前；以往任何时候
尤其；超出任何时候；比以往更加
比以往；比以前；比以往都
比之前任何；比以往；超过以往
如果曾经；如果以前；如果有过
史上最佳、史上最好；历来最佳；迄今最好

bilingual.source: Have you ever been to a forest?
Have you ever climbed the Great Wall?

list.abstract: ever是一个英语单词，可以用作副词，可以翻译为永远、曾经，等等。
Ever，前魔兽争霸3半职业选手，前DOTA半职业选手。因战术灵动，打法凶悍，常常担任职业队及高水平业余队伍的枪手而被熟知，而为人谦逊低调也使Ever并不惹人瞩目，但其对魔兽争霸3战术开发做出的贡献不可磨灭。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, hey, have you ever locked yourself in a TV cabinet, VD boy? Monkey lover.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你曾经把自己锁在电视柜里吗？性病小子。猴子爱人。

yingyinNormal.en: At least 99.9% of creatures that have ever lived aren't preserved in the fossil record.
yingyinNormal.zh: 至少99.9%曾经存在过的生物没能成为化石。

yingyinNormal.en: The kind of unique asset that no government would ever admit to employing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他就是那种特别的资产，所有政府都不会承认曾经雇佣过他。

yingyinNormal.en: Chandler, have you ever put on a black cocktail dress and asked me up to your hotel room? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你曾经穿上黑色裙子要我到你饭店的房间吗？没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, you leave Marcel out of this. Fine. Have you ever got stuck in a pair of your own leather pants?
yingyinNormal.zh: 别把马修扯进来。好吧，你曾经被自己的皮裤卡住了？

yingyinNormal.en: Llane. Have I ever let you down? Let him down? Where have you even been for the last 6 years?
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱恩，我曾经让你失望过吗？让他失望？你这六年去了哪里？

yingyinNormal.en: Have you ever had two people who weren't wearing crowns spend this much money here?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们曾经有过两个客人不穿小丑装，却在这里花了这么多钱的记录吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey Joey, have you ever been so hungry on a date that when a girl goes to the bathroom you eat some of her food?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你曾经在约会时饿到，趁女伴去上洗手间偷吃掉她的食物吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You had no right to tell me you've ever had feelings for me. What? I was doing great with Julie before I found out about you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你没有权利告诉我说你曾经喜欢过我，在我发现之前，我跟茱莉过得很快乐。

yingyinNormal.en: Cooper, I can't tell you anymore unless you agree to pilot this craft. You're the best pilot we ever had.
yingyinNormal.zh: Cooper，我只能告诉你这么多了 ，除非你同意来驾驶飞船，你曾经是我们最好的宇航员。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't afford to lose any more time. Well, this probably won't work, but has anyone ever tried to just haul off and whoop the crazy out of him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们没时间浪费了。虽然可能没多大用，但你们曾经试过运起12成功力，打他个茅塞顿开吗？

yingyinNormal.en: We don't really know if such an original language ever existed, but we do know that the thousands of languages existing today can be traced back to a much smaller number.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不知道是否曾经存在过这么一种初始语言，但我们知道如今的成千上万种语言可以追溯到有限的几种。

yingyinNormal.en: You know I get sentimental, and I was going through some of Mother's old sheave-work and I came across a description of a planet she claimed was the most rare and beautiful estate she ever owned.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道我很多愁善感，我在整理妈妈从前工作的时候发现了一颗行星，曾经被妈妈称为她拥有过的最罕见最美丽的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Ever thine, ever mine. Ever ours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 唯你永恒，唯我永恒，永恒你我。

yingyinNormal.en: Ever? I hope not. Why not?
yingyinNormal.zh: 永远不回去了？希望不会。为什么不?

yingyinNormal.en: Will we ever see you again?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们会再见面吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You ever been to Wisconsin?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你去过威斯康辛州吗?

yingyinNormal.en: This is my best birthday ever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我过的最好的生日。

yingyinNormal.en: This is my best birthday ever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我过得最好的生日。

yingyinNormal.en: This is my best birthday ever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我过得最好的生日。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 以往；以前；以往任何时候
比之前任何；比以往；超过以往

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adv. 在任何时候；从来；有时；总是；始终；越来越多地；不断地；到底；究竟；任何时候

sense_info_list.en: at any time; at any previous time

examination_example.sentence: Have you <highlight>ever</highlight> noticed how much children laugh?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你有没有注意到孩子们笑得有多厉害？

examination_example.sentence: The housing sector needs to accept that we are very unlikely to <highlight>ever</highlight> return to the era of large-scale public grants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 住房部门需要承认，我们不太可能回到大规模公共拨款的时代。

examination_example.sentence: Another urge or need is so intrinsic that we are barely <highlight>ever</highlight> conscious of its abiding claims on us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种冲动或需求是与生俱来的，以至于我们几乎从未意识到它对我们长久以来的诉求。

sense_info_list.en: used for emphasis when you are comparing things

examination_example.sentence: It is as though 20 years of <highlight>ever</highlight>-tougher reforms of the job search and benefit administration system never happened.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就好像20年来对求职和福利管理系统进行的越来越严厉的改革从未发生过一样。

examination_example.sentence: The best lawyers made skyscrapers-full of money, tempting <highlight>ever</highlight> more students to pile into law schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最好的律师赚得盆满钵满，吸引越来越多的学生涌入法学院。

examination_example.sentence: Splitting kids, or adults, into <highlight>ever</highlight>-tinier categories has proved a sure-fire way to boost profits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，将孩子或成年人分成更小的类别是提高利润的可靠方法。

sense_info_list.en: all the time or every time; always

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>Ever</highlight>-bright Prospects of Mankind
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类永远光明的前景

sense_info_list.en: used after when,why, etc. to show that you are surprised or shocked

word_usage.usage: ever so和ever such都表示“非常”，ever so通常用来修饰形容词、副词或介词短语，ever such则多用来修饰名词

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 此后一直；自...以来直至现在

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adv. 在任何时候；从来；有时；总是；始终；越来越多地；不断地；到底；究竟；任何时候

sense_info_list.en: at any time; at any previous time

examination_example.sentence: Our country is manufacturing more than <highlight>ever</highlight> before, but we are doing it with fewer workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们国家的制造业比以往任何时候都多，但我们用的工人却更少。

examination_example.sentence: They are failing to look ahead at a time when planning for the future is more important than <highlight>ever</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当规划未来比以往任何时候都更重要的时候，他们却没有向前看。

examination_example.sentence: Hawking has warned the creation of powerful artificial intelligence will be "either the best or the worst thing, <highlight>ever</highlight> to happen to humanity".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 霍金警告到，强大的人工智能(AI)的创造将是“对人类而言是最好的，也可能是最坏的事情”。

examination_example.sentence: Where should most of the money be invested to feed the <highlight>ever</highlight>-growing population?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大部分的钱应该投资在哪里来养活不断增长的人口？

examination_example.sentence: Eventually, it becomes a question in consumers' minds: Were these foods <highlight>ever</highlight> safe?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最终，它成为消费者心中的一个问题:这些食品曾经安全吗？

examination_example.sentence: That is why more people are criticizing the <highlight>ever</highlight>-increasing role of technology in our economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是为什么越来越多的人批评技术在我们经济中日益增长的作用。

examination_example.sentence: Consider the lawful side of this process and you may be able to hire the best employee <highlight>ever</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到这个过程的合法方面，你可能会雇佣到有史以来最好的员工。

examination_example.sentence: The average student's debt upon graduation now approaches $40, 000, and as college becomes <highlight>ever</highlight> more expensive, calls to make it "free" are multiplying.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，学生在毕业时的平均负债接近4万美元。上大学变得越来越贵，让它“免费”的呼声越来越高。

word_usage.usage:
ever表“任何时候, 从来, 曾经”，多用于否定句、疑问句或与if连用的句子，通常置于动词前。
示例：Have you ever been to Shanghai?
你去过上海吗？

ever可与hardly, few, little等半否定词连用。
示例：It hardly ever snows here.
这儿几乎从不下雪。

ever用于肯定句的情况：
(1) 修饰“最高级+名词”结构的定语从句。
示例：This is the worst cold I've ever had.
这是我患过的最严重的感冒。
(2) 修饰比较级，表示“越来越”。
示例：They grew ever further apart.
他们变得越来越疏远了。
(3) 表示“总是”（=always）。
示例：It remains as popular as ever.
它和以往一样仍然很受欢迎。
(4) 用于某些习语，如ever since(自从)。
示例：He's had a car ever since he was 18.
他从18岁起就有汽车了。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 此后一直；自...以来直至现在

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: at any time; at any previous time

examination_example.sentence: So, how did we <highlight>ever</highlight> invent "unnatural" numbers in the first place?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，我们最初是如何发明“非自然”数字的呢？

examination_example.sentence: Godel and his team sourced the online discussion forum to find all the 40,000 questions that had <highlight>ever</highlight> been asked since the class was launched.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 戈德尔教授和他的团队在网上论坛找到了自课程开始以来所有被问到的40000个问题。

examination_example.sentence: Signs barring cell-phone use are a familiar sight to anyone who has <highlight>ever</highlight> sat in a hospital waiting room.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 禁止使用手机的标志对任何在医院候诊室里坐过的人来说都是一个熟悉的景色。

examination_example.sentence: Probably more than half of all administrative work is only there because of an <highlight>ever</highlight>-existing sense that "you can't trust anyone these days".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可能一半以上的行政工作都在那里，只是因为一种一直存在的感觉，“现在你不能相信任何人”。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>ever</highlight>-growing cost of petrol.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不断增长的汽油成本。

examination_example.sentence: It's more useful to think of life as something that is <highlight>ever</highlight> evolving and changing, rather than a high-risk enterprise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把生命看成是不断进化变化的东西，而不是高风险的企业，更有用。

examination_example.sentence: If the food situation continues to worsen, entire nations will break down at an <highlight>ever</highlight> increasing rate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果粮食形势继续恶化，整个国家将以越来越快的速度崩溃。

word_usage.usage:
ever表“任何时候, 从来, 曾经”，多用于否定句、疑问句或与if连用的句子，通常置于动词前。
示例：Have you ever been to Shanghai?
你去过上海吗？

ever可与hardly, few, little等半否定词连用。
示例：It hardly ever snows here.
这儿几乎从不下雪。

ever用于肯定句的情况：
(1) 修饰“最高级+名词”结构的定语从句。
示例：This is the worst cold I've ever had.
这是我患过的最严重的感冒。
(2) 修饰比较级，表示“越来越”。
示例：They grew ever further apart.
他们变得越来越疏远了。
(3) 表示“总是”（=always）。
示例：It remains as popular as ever.
它和以往一样仍然很受欢迎。
(4) 用于某些习语，如ever since(自从)。
示例：He's had a car ever since he was 18.
他从18岁起就有汽车了。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 以往；以前；以往任何时候

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: at any time; at any previous time

examination_example.sentence: If the only reading you <highlight>ever</highlight> do is the novel or magazine, the speed at which you read-probably does not matter very much.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你唯一的阅读量就是看小说和杂志，那么阅读速度就不那么重要了。

examination_example.sentence: We need artists more than <highlight>ever</highlight> in our schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们学校比以往任何时候都需要艺术家。

examination_example.sentence: More students than <highlight>ever</highlight> before are taking a gap year (间隔年) before going to university.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的学生在上大学前选择间隔年。

examination_example.sentence: Millions of acres of wetlands were dried to feed and house the <highlight>ever</highlight>-increasing populations, greatly reducing waterfowl habitat (栖息地).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数百万英亩的湿地被抽干，用作农地或修建住房，极大地减少了水禽的栖息地。

word_usage.usage:
ever多用于疑问句、否定句和条件句中：
Have you ever been to Sanya?
你曾到过三亚吗？
If you ever come to Shanghai, we'll have to get together.
如果你来上海，我们一定要聚一聚。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 主要用来谈过去发生的动作，多用于疑问句中，常常和现在完成时、一般过去时或过去完成时连用。
则表示有过某种经验、经历，用于肯定句中，句子用一般过去时。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adv. 在任何时候；从来；有时；总是；始终；越来越多地；不断地；到底；究竟；任何时候

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 此后一直；自…以来直至现在
以往；以前；以往任何时候
比以往；比以前；比以往都

sense_info_list.en: at any time; at any previous time

examination_example.sentence: It was the hardest term I would <highlight>ever</highlight> have.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是我曾经经历过的最艰难的一个学期。

examination_example.sentence: The young man looked at his heart, not perfect anymore but more beautiful than <highlight>ever</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年轻人看着自己的心，它已不再完美，但比以往任何时候都美丽。

examination_example.sentence: The greatest live show <highlight>ever</highlight> is coming to town!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有史以来最棒的现场表演就要来到我们城市了！

examination_example.sentence: The great scientist Yuan Longping left us last month, but he will live in our hearts for <highlight>ever</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伟大的科学家袁隆平上个月离开了我们，但他将永远活在我们心中。

examination_example.sentence: It has taught me things are never, <highlight>ever</highlight>, end-of-the-world kind of bad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它教会我，事情从来都不是像世界末日那样糟糕。

examination_example.sentence: The result is an <highlight>ever</highlight>-changing idea of what is considered beautiful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结果就是什么是美成为了一个不断变化的概念。

examination_example.sentence: And Peter Pan has been very famous around the world <highlight>ever</highlight> since.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从那以后，彼得·潘在全世界都很有名。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Ever</highlight> since kindergarten (学前班), Linda's father had invited each of his daughter's teachers to write some words about her in a notebook.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从幼儿园开始, 琳达的父亲就邀请他女儿的每一位老师在笔记本上写一些关于她的话。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Ever</highlight> since then, traditional Chinese medicine has played an important role in the fight against COVID-19.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自此，中医药在抗击新冠肺炎疫情中发挥了重要作用。

word_usage.usage:
ever表“任何时候, 从来, 曾经”，多用于否定句、疑问句或与if连用的句子，通常置于动词前。
示例：Have you ever been to Shanghai?
你去过上海吗？

ever可与hardly, few, little等半否定词连用。
示例：It hardly ever snows here.
这儿几乎从不下雪。

ever用于肯定句的情况：
(1) 修饰“最高级+名词”结构的定语从句。
示例：This is the worst cold I've ever had.
这是我患过的最严重的感冒。
(2) 修饰比较级，表示“越来越”。
示例：They grew ever further apart.
他们变得越来越疏远了。
(3) 表示“总是”（=always）。
示例：It remains as popular as ever.
它和以往一样仍然很受欢迎。
(4) 用于某些习语，如ever since(自从)。
示例：He's had a car ever since he was 18.
他从18岁起就有汽车了。
